# Documentation #



All of the files below are written in Japanese and most of them are PDF files.

## MGCL Technical Memo ##
  * [MGCL Technical Memo](http://mgcl.googlecode.com/svn/doc/mgcl-technical.pdf) - Not be maintained.
    * [Class Diagram](http://mgcl.googlecode.com/svn/doc/class-diagram.pdf) - Simple diagram.
    * [MGCL Library Reference](http://mgcl.googlecode.com/svn/doc/html/index.html) - Library reference generated by Doxygen (HTML format).

## CAGD by MGCL ##
This documentation describes mathematical background of MGCL in Japanese.

  * [CAGD by MGCL (cover)](http://mgcl.googlecode.com/svn/doc/cagd-by-mgcl.pdf)
    * [Chapter 1. Dimension](http://mgcl.googlecode.com/svn/doc/cagd-ch01-dimension.pdf)
    * [Chapter 2. Divided Difference](http://mgcl.googlecode.com/svn/doc/cagd-ch02-divided-difference.pdf)
    * [Chapter 3. Lines and Planes](http://mgcl.googlecode.com/svn/doc/cagd-ch03-straight-plane.pdf)
    * [Chapter 4. Curves](http://mgcl.googlecode.com/svn/doc/cagd-ch04-curve.pdf)
    * [Chapter 5. B-Spline](http://mgcl.googlecode.com/svn/doc/cagd-ch05-b-spline.pdf)
    * [Chapter 6. NURBS](http://mgcl.googlecode.com/svn/doc/cagd-ch06-nurbs.pdf)
    * [Chapter 7. Surfaces](http://mgcl.googlecode.com/svn/doc/cagd-ch07-surface.pdf)
    * [Chapter 8. Fitting and Approximation](http://mgcl.googlecode.com/svn/doc/cagd-ch08-fitting.pdf)
    * Chapter 9. (under construction)
    * [Chapter 10. Solid Modeling](http://mgcl.googlecode.com/svn/doc/cagd-ch10-solid-modeling.pdf)
    * [Chapter 11. Numerical Functions](http://mgcl.googlecode.com/svn/doc/cagd-ch11-numeric.pdf)
